backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor handling authorization, user profiles, products, orders, and storage with associated data types and basic CRUD functions.
backend/migration.mo: Migrates legacy user profiles to the new profile format by mapping old data to new fields with default email, phone, and buyer role.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, and tests for the e‑commerce transformation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence summaries of various frontend pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint setting up fonts, favicon, root element, and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, routing between pages, and role‑based views for buyers, sellers, and admins.
frontend/src/components/CheckInDialog.ts: UI dialog for submitting or editing noise and WiFi ratings for a location, with validation and selection controls.
frontend/src/components/EditNameDialog.t: Dialog allowing users to update their profile name by saving changes through the user profile hook.
frontend/src/components/FilterDialog.tsx: Dialog component for selecting temporary noise and Wi‑Fi filters and applying or clearing them.
frontend/src/components/LocationPreviewC: Provides utilities to compute rating averages and generate HTML for map popups based on location data.
frontend/src/components/MapControls.tsx: Renders map control buttons for locating the user and toggling manual relocation.
frontend/src/components/MapHeader.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no content.
frontend/src/components/MapOverlays.tsx: Shows overlays for relocation mode, loading, errors, and prompting users to set their location.
frontend/src/components/MapSearchBar.tsx: Search bar with results dropdown, radius selector, and filter dialog for noise and Wi‑Fi.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no content.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays product info including image, price, stock status, and handles click navigation.
frontend/src/components/ProductImageUplo: Image uploader for products with validation, upload progress, and removal support.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog component that collects user profile info and saves it via a profile mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ReviewsDialog.ts: Empty placeholder file for a reviews dialog component.
frontend/src/components/StoreLayout.tsx: Main store layout with navigation, mobile menu, header, logout handling, and role-based links.
Selector UI for choosing size and color variants and mapping selections to a variant index.
frontend/src/constants/filters.ts: Defines noise, Wi‑Fi, and radius filter types and option lists for filtering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminProducts.ts: Hooks for fetching pending products and approving or rejecting them with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Hooks for CRUD operations on the cart and auto‑refreshing cart queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useGeolocation.ts: Manages user geolocation with manual setting, auto‑fetching, and callbacks on location changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating order data, including retrieving orders and updating order status.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Contains hooks for fetching all products or a single product via the actor backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Legacy placeholder file kept for backward compatibility and no longer used.
frontend/src/hooks/useSellerProducts.ts: Provides hooks for fetching seller-specific products and submitting or updating product data.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Implements hooks for fetching, saving, and checking user profile and admin status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining theme variables, colors, and layout styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin page for viewing, approving, and rejecting pending products with UI controls and notifications.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrdersPage.tsx: Admin interface for viewing all orders and updating their statuses, including filtering states and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart, allowing quantity updates, item removal, and navigation to checkout or catalog.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Shows all products with search filtering and navigation to individual product pages.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Collects shipping and payment details, calculates totals, and submits an order.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Loads and displays confirmation details for a placed order with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and shows detailed order information including items, status, and summary.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists the buyer’s past orders with status badges and links to order details.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Renders a product detail view with images, variant selection, quantity controls, and add‑to‑cart handling using hooks and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/SellerDashboardPage.t: Displays a seller’s product list with status badges and navigation to add products or view orders.
frontend/src/pages/SellerOrdersPage.tsx: Shows seller-specific orders with status indicators and navigation back to the seller dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/SellerProductFormPage: Provides a form for creating or editing products, managing images and variants, and submitting updates via seller hooks.
frontend/src/types/leaflet.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for Leaflet-related types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, radii, and enabling plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot of the SK Selling Clothes web app project containing high‑level goals, architecture notes, issues, required images, and a list of existing implemented or planned features. It mainly tracks storefront, login roles, approval workflows, product features, and payments for build planning.
